characterDescription:
The enemy's champion is revealed by Honor to Dalinar in a vision. Honor later tells him that humanity's best chance of survival in the coming conflict involves forcing Odium to accept a contest of champions.
Dalinar stares deep into the eyes of the creature and feels a chill wash through him. Though destruction rages around him, those eyes frighten him more. He sees something terribly familiar in them and knows that this is a danger far beyond even the storms.
Those eyes haunt him and he fears Odium's champion.

characterDetails.Appearance:
It is described as a dark figure in black Shardplate that has nine shadows, each spreading out in a different direction, and its eyes glow a brilliant red.
Dalinar suggests that - due to it's appearance - perhaps it is a parshman.
characterDetails.Notes: According to the Stormfather, the nine shadows are the Unmade.
